This is implemented in the plugin. It is possible to buy a lot before the start of the auction, as well as after the end of the auction. Adjusted by settings in Bidspirit.
Это реализовано в плагине. Есть возможность купить лот до начала торгов, а так же после завершения торгов. Регулируется настройками в Bidspirit.

Configuration: Configuration of the webhooks is done through bidspirit admin. In order to enable webhook calls the party implementing the api needs to provide a bidspirit admin the endpoint webhook url and an authentication token
To authenticate a request: Load the secret authentication token Process md5 on token+”_”+<http reqeust body> The result should be equals to value sent in the X-BIDSPIRIT-SIGNATURE header
the secret should be stored in a secure place

I'm having trouble storing the "sendBidEmails" and "sendOverBidEmails" values for the user when sending the itemsplaceBid request. Changing the value of "sendBidEmails" causes "sendOverBidEmails" to change its value as well. When changes to "sendOverBidEmails" do not result in any changes.

Я испытываю проблемы с тем что бы сохранить значения "sendBidEmails" and "sendOverBidEmails" для пользователя при отправке запроса itemsplaceBid. Изменение значения "sendBidEmails" приводит к тому что и "sendOverBidEmails" меняет своё значение. Когда изменения "sendOverBidEmails" не приводят к каким либо изменениям.
if true - send an email to the user when a higher bid on this item is placed . this value should be saved for the next time the use places a bid
if true - send a bid confirmation email. this value should be saved for the next time the use places a bid
true if the user wants to get email confirmation when he puts an absentee bid. this value should be the default for sendBidEmails param when calling itemsplaceBid

true if the user wants to get an email notification when a higher bid is placed on an item which he put a bid on. This value should be the default for sendOverBidEmails param when calling itemsplaceBid
